item.title: About Mitz
item.description: Work Systems Reliability Engineer Kubernetes Container Go, Python 3.x Former Embedded Linux Engineer C, C++, Shell, Python 2.x Linux kernel(arch/arm, arch/powerpc, drivers/watchdog, drivers/mtd etc) X.Org(libX11, XVideo, XRandR, Intel Graphics Driver) GTK+(GDK) udev, hal, dbus, Webkit, GStreamer Former Writer of Linux magazine in Japan. Education University of the People(‘18-) Degree Seeking Student Bachelor of Computer Science Community Slideshare Japan Linux Conference 2010 Speaker 第51回コンピュータセキュリティ研究発表会(CSEC51) Speaker/Panelist MeeGo Seminar Winter 2010 Speaker LinuxCon Japan 2010 Speaker LinuxCon Japan 2011 Speaker(canceled.
